phrases: So let us see if we did it right.
Yes, it is just the right texture.
Let us wait until it cools down, then continue with next part.
Touya has not come home yet, has he?
Um, um, I will go have a look!
What is with coming back with nothing but books about cakes?
We are making cakes in Home Ec this week.
Now that Dad taught me a thing or two, I want to learn more.
If it is any good, I will bring some back for you, OK?
Do not worry, it is just practice.
It is so big, we cannot just eat it by ourselves, right?
Why do not you take some to your friends at school?
We will ask Touya, maybe Yukito would like some tomorrow, too.
It would be nice if I could make one as good as yours, Dad'
I am sure you will do fine.
So what is the best way to make a cake like this?
Make it with all your heart'for the one you love.
I had some failures before making this one.
If you make one that tastes good, anyone would want to eat it, right?
I wonder if we can make a good one today.
You and Chiharu have Rika in your group.
You are really good at making cakes, Rika!
Oh, I am not that good'
What about this kind of cake?
That is a wedding cake, is not it?
So our group has decided to make a strawberry shortcake, right?
I cannot decide on what kind of cake to make.
do you like chocolate cakes, too?
You are preparing for Home Economics, right?
We are making cakes during tomorrow's class.
Oh, if it turns out alright, I will bring you a piece.
I will be looking forward to it.
So we are making chocolate cake?
What kind of cake is your group making?
Sakura, are you all here to buy cakes, too?
No, tomorrow we are making cakes in Home Ec.
Yes, these cakes are really good!
Um, Yukito, what kind of cake do you like?
Cheesecake, shortcake, blueberry, banana cream pie'
I like all kinds of cakes!
Um, if it turns out all right,
would you like to have some?
I will be looking forward to it.
There is no way it is nothing at all.
I just thought I would surprise you
with a cake when you got home'
Go back in the kitchen and do it yourself!
Mei Lin, do not get mad!
T' that is a little too much'
We can fix it, do not worry.
After lunch, we will take them out of the ovens, okay?
But, Rika, you are actually quite good at making cakes, are not you?
My dad likes sweets, so I make them fairly often.
Rika, your father is always overseas for work, is not he?
My dad really likes strawberry shortcake.
Mister Terada was like my dad'
Since he likes cake, after it is done,
you could take some to him.
Your cakes are always so delicious!
Well, let us sample our work!
You sure you did not just add too much sugar?
Tomoyo was careful about how much she added.
Besides, it is weird that everyone elses cakes ended up too sweet, too.
I wonder if that is it'
we are doing it over again next week.
You are pretty enthusiastic about that.
I am going to give some to Yukito and Miss Mizuki!
Do not forget to save some for me'
but why cannot I make cakes?
I wonder if I will ever make a good cake.
Oh well, I guess that is one thing I will not be able to do.
The cake failure was not your fault.
Shao Lan's such a nice guy.
Alright, better study up so I can make one for Shao Lan to eat!
It would be great if we could make something like this.
This time, we will get it right for sure!
Why did they all get so sweet?
Yes, I was thinking I wanted to eat something sweet.
I heard you were going to do the cakes over again.
The cakes another class made in Home Ec yesterday'
They ALL turned out too sweet!
I wonder if something got in there.
Could a Clow Card be responsible?
Will that be too sweet today?
All these sweets look so good'
Could it be that the cakes in Sakura's class'
Made all your cakes that way.
It makes food and everything into sweets!
It loves things that are sweet to begin with, so that is why it picked the cakes!
Anyway, it does not because much trouble.
If the cakes turn out too sweet again, that will be terrible!
It really was the aura of a Clow Card.
It is somewhere in this classroom.
We have to find it before everyone comes back.
It is doing something to the cake.
This is not the time to be impressed!
I will trap it in here.
So it loves things that are sweet to begin with'
Key which hides the power of darkness'
By the covenant, I, Sakura, command thee.
I think they will turn out alright this time.
I wonder if Sakura will bring back some cake for me'
So, let us see if we did it right this time.
Now, let us eat some and try it out.
Try some of this cake I made!
You must have stirred the batter too much.
So it was a Clow Card's doing?
Sasaki, you are a really good cook.
No, this cake is very good.
Not bad for something a monster made.
I would eat this every day if I could.
Let us hurry home and make a cake!
This time I will get it right!
It has to do with the stirring, right?
I stirred it too much last time,
so I just need to tone that down, right?
Hey, are you listening, Shao Lan?
